page.title: 05GOVERNMENT
page.content: The town and the area around Knighton is administered by a three tier system of government,as well as the Government in London.The{Powys {County Council,the Radnor District {Council and the Knighton Town Council all levy part of the rates.The Powys County Council is responsible for the maintenance of the highways,health, education,museums and libraries.The Radnor District Council is responsible for sewage,council houses and planning. The Knighton Town Council is the watchdog in the area and makes suggestions and requests to the other two councils.There is one local member on the Powys County Council and four local members on the Radnor District Council.The chairman of the Knighton Town Council is also the Mayor.
